docs.lead_paragraph: Update: The pie chart only shows that part of health care paid for by insurance. The rest is out-of-pocket spending, which happens even in single-payer systems, public health spending, and a grab-bag of other stuff. Source is here (pdf).

As families of prospective college freshmen begin to tackle the Free Application for Federal Student Aid, or Fafsa, Mark Kantrowitz, a financial aid expert and founder of the Web sites finaid.org and fastweb.com, is answering questions from readers of The Choice this week.

headline.main: Part 6: Answers to Readers' Questions on Financial Aid

docs.abstract: Mark Kantrowitz, a financial-aid guru, is answering reader questions on the Free Application for Federal Student Aid, and other topics of the season.
